atk-s0402a15:1_0: 181. Ito paresu kujjhanalakkhaṇo kodho. Upanandhanalakkhaṇo upanāho. Sukatakaraṇamakkhanalakkhaṇo
atk-s0402a15:1_1: makkho. Yugaggāhalakkhaṇo palāso. Usūyanalakkhaṇā issā. Pañcamaccherabhāvo macchariyaṁ.
atk-s0402a15:1_2: Taṁ sabbampi maccharāyanalakkhaṇaṁ. Katapaṭicchādanalakkhaṇā māyā. Kerāṭikalakkhaṇaṁ
atk-s0402a15:1_3: sāṭheyyaṁ. Alajjanākāro ahirikaṁ. Upavādato abhāyanākāro anottappaṁ. Akkodhādayo
atk-s0402a15:2_0: 185.Sekkhassa bhikkhunoti sattavidhassāpi sekkhassa upariupariguṇehi parihānāya saṁvattanti,
atk-s0402a15:2_1: puthujjanassa pana paṭhamataraṁyeva parihānāya saṁvattantīti veditabbā. Aparihānāyāti
atk-s0402a15:3: 187.Yathābhataṁ nikkhittoti yathā ānetvā nikkhitto, evaṁ niraye patiṭṭhito vāti veditabbo.
atk-s0402a15:4: 190.Ekaccoti yassete kodhādayo atthi, so ekacco nāma.
